fullplot: Jim Piersall is groomed by his loving but hard-driving father (living vicariously through his son) to play major league baseball. His desire to succeed to please his father leads to mental illness and a nervous breakdown. Can he overcome those difficulties and return to the major leagues?
plot: True story of the life of Jimmy Piersall, who battled mental illness to achieve stardom in major league baseball.
title: Fear Strikes Out

tomatoes.consensus: Based on the true story of troubled baseball star Jimmy Piersall, Fear Strikes Out is an emotionally compelling drama featuring excellent performances from Anthony Perkins and Karl Malden.

writers: Jimmy Piersall (based on the story by)
Al Hirshberg (based on the story by)
